body.name: ZUBULUN Broom with Dustpan Combo Set for Home, 54 Inches Long Handle 180 Degree Rotating Brush Indoor Outdoor Kitchen Lobby Dorm Classroom, Small Standing Dust Pan with Comb Teeth (Grey Purple)

features: 【54" Adjustable Handle】 ZUBULUN Kitchen broom is equipped with 5 section extension poles, so you can customize the length from 30.5" to 54" at will. This dustpan and brush set allows you eliminate bending and sore waist while sweeping.

【Patented Swivel Head】 This collapsible angled broom head can rotate 180°and has two clips for grasping the non-woven fiber cloth, so you could catch the hair, debris effectively. The 45° 4-layer bristles design is easy to reach the dust in the gap.

【Self Cleaning Dustpan】 The upright dustpan with comb teeth can help you scrape off hair and debris from bristles without dirtying your hands. The transparent dustpan window makes you see the garbage inside clearly, so you could clean it before it stinks.

【Seamless Rubber Lip】 The rubber lip of the portable dustpan is fully flush with the floor, so no dust or garbage would be left under the dustpan. Besides, there’s a small exit on the dustpan, which is great for pouring the rubbish without leaking outside.

【Compact Storage】 This space-saver camping broom and dustpan set for home features with a clip-on connector, 90° folding dustpan and a hanging hole. So when not using, fold the dustpan, clip them together and hang them on the wall.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 180° Swivel Head The 180° swivel head is giving cleaning the access to hard-to-reach places, you could easily reach out to narrow corner, under the sofa and so on. The design is making cleaning more joyable, time-saving and labor-saving. See-through Dustpan with Unique Sloping Exit A practical see-through dustpan is associated with a convenient design for dumping out the wastes off the dustpan. The sloping exit gathers the wastes centralized not dispersing, making you feel soothing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product!! Easy assembly
reviews.reviewText: It came in a small box. My 6 year old granddaughter insisted on putting it together for me. It was that easy. I love the dust pan, just the right height and the teeth on it for helpful removal of dirt and grime. The broom swivels to be able to reach in all areas. It's light and easy to carry around. It works fabulous. I wish I had bought one earlier, it would have saved my back alot of bending!! Love it!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Comfortable height, the teeth are amazing idea and does pick up everything very satisfied

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A Versatile (But Fragile) Broom
reviews.reviewText: It looks exactly like the photos. I have several pros and some cons.The Pros:-The broom has handle extenders for both the broom and dustpan, so bye bye to constantly bending over to sweep debris.-The bending feature allows the broom to bend and twist while you sweep to get those harder to reach crevices easily.-The dustpan easily picks up debris and the bristles keep your broom clean without you having to do the nasty maintenance yourself.-The Broom has sockets to apply tissues or wet wipes for a diy Swiffer type effect to wipe as you sweep (can't believe this wasn't mentioned much!). I love being able to add wipes to it when needed.-The dustpan has a divot on the side that allows you to gather all your trash (That you can see from the clear top!) into one corner and toss it altogether. It makes the entire sweeping process smoother.The Cons:-The bristles are soft and wobbly. They are so soft that it's hard to get a good press onto the ground before you sweep, and they wiggle after every sweep Sometimes that wiggle will toss debris around unintentionally, making you have to go back and resweep small areas.-The broom itself is small. It's not meant for big rooms. More suitable for a kid's room, a bathroom, or a college dorm.-The dustpan is VERY easily dented. try not to tap it against the trash, as it will dent the parts that keep you able to easily sweep trash into it.All in all, if you need a quick broom for quick areas and REALLY like the bristles, this will do wonders. But if you only plan on having one broom in your household, consider a sturdier one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this set

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: My 72 year old mom was able to put this together by herself so that means it’s EASY to do. She loves it! Tall enough that she doesn’t have to stoop down to sweep.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This dust pan and broom are top notch!
reviews.reviewText: The dust pan stands up by itself! The teeth on it get all of the nasties off of the broom without bending over and the broom is securely held by the clip on the dust pan! The purple and grey matches my Dyson vacuum! Another small win in life! Great product. Definitely worth the $$.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wish I had gotten one of these sooner!
reviews.reviewText: I have balance issues and so find it difficult to bend over or squat. This has made it possible to sweep my floors and not wait for my husband to sweep into the dustpan. And it leaves nothing behind (unlike another brand I tried).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The only thing about this set is the fact that the broom clips to the dustpan, other than that it's pretty useless! The bristles on the brush are so soft and flimsy that it takes forever to get whatever you're sweeping into the dustpan. I literally had to buy another broom to make this functional. If you're looking for a good set don't buy this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Quick and easy to assemble. Quite Sturdy. The brush is heavier than I expected it to be. I ended up takinh one section of the brush off as it was a little too long to use with 1 hand. It's quite versatile in terms of getting in between obstacles, though it does get a little frustrating when the head bends to one side when trying to sweep.I like the window feature of the pan which is handy for seeing how full it is.
